name: Orange Dream (Arfilish)
description:
Orange Dream is short puzzle game with horror elements. Originally was made for alexmile gamejam 2022 in 4 days in solo, but it was little bit refined and exists independent now due to some specific reasons.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - interaction
  • ESC - cancel
  • You will need to use mouse in puzzles

Made with:

  • Godot 3.5 - game engine
  • Krita, Aseprite - 2D graphics
  • Blender - 3D pre-renders
  • Reaper - SFX and music.

Used font in game: Noto Serif
